sqlMap.select: SELECT G.YEAR , G.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID, G.EVAL_USER_GRP_NM , G.WEIGHT , G.DEVIA_YN , NULL AS DEVIA_YN_NM , G.EVAL_USER_GRP_GBN_ID , C.CODE_NM AS EVAL_USER_GRP_GBN_NM , NVL( U.EVAL_USER_CNT, 0) AS EVAL_USER_CNT , G.SORT_ORDER FROM BSC_IPE_EVAL_USER_GRP G LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT YEAR, EVAL_USER_GRP_ID , COUNT( EVAL_USER_ID ) AS EVAL_USER_CNT FROM BSC_IPE_EVAL_USER WHERE 1=1 AND YEAR = #findYear# GROUP BY YEAR, EVAL_USER_GRP_ID ) U ON G.YEAR = U.YEAR AND G.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID = U.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE_NM FROM BSC_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND CODE_GRP_ID = '150' AND YEAR IN (SELECT CASE YEAR_YN WHEN 'Y' THEN #findYear# ELSE '9999' END FROM BSC_CODE_GRP WHERE CODE_GRP_ID = '150') AND DELETE_DT IS NULL ) C ON G.EVAL_USER_GRP_GBN_ID = C.CODE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND G.YEAR = #findYear# ORDER BY G.SORT_ORDER NULLS LAST, G.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID

SELECT YEAR , EVAL_USER_GRP_ID , EVAL_USER_GRP_NM , WEIGHT , DEVIA_YN , EVAL_USER_GRP_GBN_ID , SORT_ORDER FROM BSC_IPE_EVAL_USER_GRP WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND EVAL_USER_GRP_ID = #evalUserGrpId#

SELECT A.EVAL_USER_ID USER_ID , B.USER_NM , B.DEPT_ID , C.DEPT_F_NM DEPT_NM , B.JIKGUB_CD , B.JIKGUB_NM , B.POS_CD , B.POS_NM FROM BSC_IPE_EVAL_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN V_ROLE_USER B ON A.EVAL_USER_ID = B.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN V_DEPTINFO C ON B.DEPT_ID = C.DEPT_ID WHERE A.YEAR =#year# AND A.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID = #evalUserGrpId# ORDER BY B.USER_NM
